name: The Perfect Vegan Mashed Potatoes
description: It took some time to perfect, but these are without a doubt the perfect vegan mashed potatoes. They are smooth, rich, buttery, and irresistible. Serve for a crowd or for your weeknight dinners with the family.

recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons Primal Kitchen Extra Version Olive oil
4  russet potatoes, medium (peeled cut into 1 inch slices. (3lbs.))
1 cup Potato water ((water in which the potatoes were cooked))
1 jar Primal Kitchen Vegan Mushroom Gravy

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 400F. Place a head of garlic on a sheet of aluminum foil, close it up, and baskr at 400Ffor 20 minutes
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat oven to 400F. Place a head of garlic on a sheet of aluminum foil, close it up, and baskr at 400Ffor 20 minutes

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a medium pot with cold water. Place sliced potatoes in the pot and bring to a simmer slowly. Simmer for 15 to 20 minutes or until tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Fill a medium pot with cold water. Place sliced potatoes in the pot and bring to a simmer slowly. Simmer for 15 to 20 minutes or until tender.

recipeInstructions.text: Drain potatoes, but reserve 1 cup of the potato cooking water.
recipeInstructions.name: Drain potatoes, but reserve 1 cup of the potato cooking water.

recipeInstructions.text: Pass the potatoes, garlic, and butter through the potato ricer, or mash with a fork. Place in a pot.
recipeInstructions.name: Pass the potatoes, garlic, and butter through the potato ricer, or mash with a fork. Place in a pot.

recipeInstructions.text: Add butter and potato water and stir slowly to incorporate the butter.
recipeInstructions.name: Add butter and potato water and stir slowly to incorporate the butter.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the vegan cream cheese and stir. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the vegan cream cheese and stir. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a pot over low heat. Add the mushroom gravy and heat for about 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle the mashed potatoes with the gravy and serve. Enjoy!
